text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Heres the impact - @potus has created a disaster of giant proportions because he played politics & listens to lackeys & agenda driven yahoo's over experts. Sadly, he continues to dig the hole deeper. Soon it will be filled with American lives. #WakeUp #TrumpFailedAmerica #COVID19
